code:
import axios from'axios';var API=axios.create({baseURL:'http://localhost:5000'});API.interceptors.request.use(function(req){if(localStorage.getItem('profile')){req.headers.Authorization="Bearer ".concat(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('profile')).token);}return req;});//auth
export var signIn=function signIn(userData){return API.post('/users/signin',userData);};export var signUp=function signUp(userData){return API.post('/users/signup',userData);};//settings
export var getSettings=function getSettings(){return API.get('/settings');};export var getOneSetting=function getOneSetting(id){return API.get("/settings/".concat(id));};export var createSettings=function createSettings(newSetting){return API.post('/settings',newSetting);};export var editSettings=function editSettings(id,updatedSetting){return API.patch("/settings/".concat(id),updatedSetting);};export var deleteSetting=function deleteSetting(id){return API.delete("/settings/".concat(id));};//items
export var getItems=function getItems(){return API.get('/items');};export var getOneItem=function getOneItem(id){return API.get("/items/".concat(id));};export var saveItem=function saveItem(newItem){return API.post('/items',newItem);};export var editItem=function editItem(id,updatedItem){return API.patch("/items/".concat(id),updatedItem);};export var deleteItem=function deleteItem(id){return API.delete("/items/".concat(id));};
